posts.author: conlaoch
posts.content:
So I was at work the other day and did my daily quick scan of the ECB boards and saw a druid/Dragon shape build.  And that's when I had a thought.  Can we have an undispellable Caster Druid with Dragon shape and Epic Dodge?

I mentioned this to Orion and Whammo...    in my inbox popped 3-4 different versions of a Epic dodging Dragon Druid.  Tonight when I get home I'll try and cut and paste those into the forum as it would be a shame for Orion's hard work to be relegated to growing dusty in my Inbox.   If Orion wanders by, feel free to post them all here if you get here before I get home from work. 

Here's one of them cut and pasted, hopefully it maintains the formatting...

So you can have a Druid 28 / CoT 2 / SD 10 epic dodging undispellable dragon build

Sacked the intelligence score sadly, so lost lots of skill points

posts.author: conlaoch
posts.content:
Nuther Orion original....

Epic Champion of Torm is key here to pump Wisdom as high as possible to make this work. 

Druid will need to be at least 18 for Dragon Shape. CoT at least 10. Which leaves 12 levels of something else to play with. The only way I think it can work is with Shadowdancer 10. Druid 18 / CoT 8 / Rogue 14 is a possibility as well? Maybe. Might be interesting if that is possible...

Chose elf for Keen Senses which works when polymorphed. 

Anyway hope you enjoy :)

The Holy Grail for us would have been a Druid / Monk / SD epic dodging dragon shape build but unfortunately there were not enough stat increases possible for me to figure out how to achieve this. 

I did some math:

Elf starting Dex 20 (18+2) Wis 17 -> Dex 25 Wis 30 requires 5 + 13 attribute increases = 18

10 attribute increases over 40 levels
7 epic general feats, 0 to 2 of which might need to be used for Epic Dodge and Dragon Shape (unless DS is taken as a bonus feat at a druid level, or ED taken as a bonus SD feat)
= 15-17 attribute increases

So at least one bonus great wisdom feat is going to be needed

On a server where extra attribute bonuses to Dex or Wis are available, a Epic Dodging Dragon Shape Monk build might be possible. The suggested class split would be Druid 24 / Monk 3 / SD 13.
